SELECT prr.pre_no, pt.prt_name, prr.prt_qty, pe.ins_qty, pe.pre_date, pe.pre_manager, ee.emp_name
FROM product pt JOIN produce pe ON pt.prt_code = pe.prt_code JOIN process_run prr ON prr.pre_no = pe.pre_no JOIN process_inf pri ON pri.prs_no = prr.prs_no JOIN employee ee ON ee.emp_id = pe.pre_manager WHERE prr.prt_qty > 0 AND pri.prs_st_hour IS NOT NULL AND pri.prs_sp_hour IS NULL ORDER BY prr.pre_no DESC

SELECT ma.mat_code, ma.mat_name, lo.lot_qty, mo.mat_out_qty
FROM material ma JOIN process pr ON ma.prs_code = pr.prs_code JOIN process_run prr ON pr.prs_code = prr.prs_code JOIN mat_out mo ON mo.mat_out_no = prr.mat_out_no JOIN lot lo ON mo.mat_lot_no = lo.lot_no JOIN produce pe ON pe.pre_no = #{preNo}
